message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. However, I'm still a bit above your proposed price point.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000, reflecting the value you see in this product. Let's make this work!
